description:
A 16-year-old girl needs heart surgery, but she refuses to have it unless Ryo can find a missing person for her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Du gehst mir auf die Nerven, Kleines
Kizu Darake no Junjou! Teppoudama ni Tenshi no Inori
Wounded Innocence! A Bullet and an Angel`s Prayer
傷だらけの純情! 鉄砲玉に天使の祈り
